ACCEPT_RIDE.subject: Your Ride Awaits! Confirm with OTP 🚖
ACCEPT_RIDE.htmlContent:
Hi {{riderName}},

Your ride with {{appName}} is confirmed! 🚖

🚗 Driver's Name: {{driverName}}

📞 Driver's Contact: {{driverPhone}}

🔑 Your OTP for ride confirmation is: {{otp}}

Safe travels! 🛣️
{{appName}} Team

CANCEL_RIDE.subject: Your Ride Has Been Cancelled 🚫
CANCEL_RIDE.htmlContent:
Hi {{riderName}},

We regret to inform you that your ride with {{appName}} has been cancelled. 🚫

It seems that your driver, {{driverName}}, has ended the ride due to unforeseen circumstances. Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience. 😔

For any assistance, please contact us via the app. 📲💬

We understand this may be frustrating, and we truly appreciate your patience. 🙏
{{appName}} Team

ENDED_RIDE.subject: Your Ride with {{driverName}} Has Ended 🚘
ENDED_RIDE.htmlContent:
Hi {{riderName}},

We hope you had a pleasant experience during your ride with {{appName}}. 🚗

Your ride with {{driverName}} has successfully ended. We trust that your driver provided excellent service and ensured a comfortable journey. 🌟

We sincerely hope that the facilities and services met your expectations. If you have any feedback or questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to us.

Thank you for choosing {{appName}}. We look forward to serving you again soon! 🙏

Safe travels! 🛣️
{{appName}} Team
